DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize video-laryngoscopes beneficial intubation pediatric manikin perform CPR . In current study , compare effectiveness two video-laryngoscopes ( Coopdech video Laryngoscope portable VLp-100 Flexible Videoendoscope : ATMOS Scope ) optical-laryngoscope ( AirTraq ) resuscitation uninterrupted chest compression use child manikin .
DOC.criteria: Give voluntary consent participate study minimum 1 year work experience emergency medicine experience emergency medical personnel ( physician , nurse , paramedic ) Not meet criterion Wrist Low back diseases
